name: Clamshells
setup: Lie on your side with knees bent 90°
Stack hips and shoulders directly on top of each other
Rest head on bottom arm for support
steps: Engage core to maintain neutral spine
Keeping feet together, lift top knee by rotating at hip
Open the knee as far as comfortable without moving pelvis
Lower knee back to starting position with control
cues: Drive from glutes, not hip flexors
Feel it in the side of your glute
mistakes: Rolling backwards or forwards during movement
Using momentum instead of muscle control
Opening knee too far and compensating with back arch
safety: Stop if you feel pinching in hip or low back. Keep range of motion comfortable and controlled.

regressions: Place pillow between knees for support
Perform lying flat on back instead

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on activation and form over speed

joints.notes: Keep movement controlled and within comfortable range. Stop if any pinching sensation.
